column2: SELECT TOP #   SpecObj.specObjID,    SpecObj.ra,    SpecObj.dec,   SpecObj.z as redshift,    galaxy.u,    galaxy.g,   galaxy.r,   galaxy.i,    galaxy.z,   SpecObj.class --  zooSpec.spiral, --  zooSpec.elliptical    FROM SpecObj, zooSpec, galaxy    WHERE zooSpec.specObjID = SpecObj.specObjID   AND SpecObj.class=&&&   AND SpecObj.sourceType = &&& --  AND (  zooSpec.p_el > # --  OR zooSpec.p_cw > # --  OR zooSpec.p_acw > # --    OR zooSpec.p_mg > #) --  AND zooSpec.uncertain = #    ORDER BY SpecObj.z DESC
